1123292934739189760.text: Just got a call from a major influencer on IG we work with. Asked if this is the death of the “like 2 own it” model. I pretty much said it looks that way. Influencers, get into white labeling.https://twitter.com/liahaberman/status/1123286122379898880 …

1113455433606344704.text: You pay media buyers to run your paid traffic, not run your business. We’re not the only way you grow, in fact, we want to be the last place TO grow. Organic + Paid = happy life. Paid + more Paid = stress and anxiety. Don’t be a slave to paid. Seek balance!

1123278563405287424.text: There is too much news coming at us too fast. But, for those us that work with celebrities, and such this is pretty big. Will be anxious to see how this looks, and what the parameters are for it. But, yeah. Your move Snap/TikTokhttps://twitter.com/alyssabereznak/status/1123277945047535616 …

1122997572753166337.text: Sometimes product / market just fits. This is one ad after 2 weeks of use.pic.twitter.com/DvOxynB5NZ

1122876579099471877.text:
East Coasters wake up to quiet and little emails. 

West Coasters wake up to emails galore, texts, voicemails. We start our day stressed before we even sit down.

1123294425533206528.text: This is going to be a social issue in a year or two.https://twitter.com/WIRED/status/1123280938719481857 …

1123031019039232000.text: This should read, “hard at work creating a pretty dang informative class for you.” This class will be proof-read before it goes live, I promise. :)

1122884417096019968.text: Ok, two ad accounts have seen a drop by more than 56% in ROAS, an increase of 42% in CPA, and CPMs almost tripled. This since the March 13th outage. Starting new ad accounts today. Will test for 7 days and see if I can get better results.

1121933908981927937.text: I don’t think in my entire life have I worked as hard as I have this past 4 months. The exhaustion is real. Mental rest weekend, in 3…2... I’ll catch you all on the flip side Monday. In the meantime, may your beer be cold, your baseball team win and your ROAS be positive.

1122973645456822272.text: 3 weeks into a CBO, didn’t lose faith, its now neck and neck with the controlled test W/O CBO. You need a TON of leash to make these work. FB truly is going to have to preach patience here. Be cautious on these, but be diligent in not giving up too soon.

1123282162612969472.text: Honestly, attending Snap’s Partner Summit, and watching FB’s #F8 the future is so exciting. Both platforms are owning different spaces. The future of social is limitless. Man, giddy up.

1123215655443030018.text: A good rule of thumb is to avoid people who say "work hard, play hard."
